actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to direct the Commissioner of Social Security and the Secretary of Health and Human Resources to conduct a study on steps which might be taken to correct the Social Security benefit disparity known as the notch problems.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that the Commissioner of Social Security and the Secretary of Health and Human Services should immediately study and report to Congress by March 31, 1982, on ways to correct the benefit disparity caused by the 1977 changes in the social security retirement benefit formula.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to direct the Commissioner of Social Security and the Secretary of Health and Human Resources to conduct a study on steps which might be taken to correct the Social Security benefit disparity known as the notch problems.
